div.div: all types of mouth and tooth diseases

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: all types of mouth and tooth diseases

sense.def: Alternative Names kou chi bing 口齒病 , oral and dental diseases. All Pathological Condition of the oral cavity and the teeth. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry peng sha 蓬砂：陰㿉骨哽， 惡瘡及口齒諸病 , “For yin (i.e. scrotal) prominence-illness, choking with a bone stuck in the throat, malign sores, and all types of mouth and tooth diseases ”.
